#summary How to compile and launch.

= Compile =

  * Download latest [http://wiibrew.org/wiki/DevkitPro Devkitpro] and install.
   # Win: 
    * Download [http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads TortoiseSVN].
    * Create folder, right click on it -> TortoiseSVN -> checkout -> http://pcsx-revolution.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
    * Run Programmer's Notepad (installed with devkitPro)
    * Find the Makefile.Wii from the source you downloaded. Click Tools > Make.
   # Unix: 
    * Install subversion.
    * svn checkout http://pcsx-revolution.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ pcsx-revolution-read-only
    * "cd ./pcsx-revolution-read-only/Gamecube && make -f Makefile.Wii". Or you can modify build.sh script for your system.

= Launch =
File organisation:
{{{
sd
|-apps
| `-wiisx
|   |-boot.dol
|   |-meta.xml
|   `icon.png
|
`-wiisx
  |-bios
  |-memcards
  `-games
}}}
  * Put scph1001.bin in bios dir.
  * Memory cards will be created automaticaly on the first launch.
  * Default folder for games is sd:/wiisx/games.
  * Supported types: iso, bin, bin+cue, bin+toc, img.
  * All config files stored in sd:/wiisx.

  * Don't forget to configure PAD, default is GCpad.
